effect.en: Remove from Ariados the number of damage counters equal to the damage you did to the Defending Pokémon.
effect.fr: Retirez de Migalos autant de marqueurs de dégâts que de dégâts que vous avez infligés au Pokémon Défenseur.

effect.en: The Defending Pokémon is now Poisoned.
effect.fr: Le Pokémon Défenseur est maintenant Empoisonné.

description.en: It spins string not only from its rear but also from its mouth. It’s hard to tell which end is which.
